name: Camel Race HD - Fair Game
description:
Visit: Camel Race HD - Web Page

Compete in this frantic camel race for victory. Your ability to fit the balls will make your rider run more or less. Enjoy on your mobile the fast-paced game of the Fairs

Compete in this frantic camel race for victory.

Easy controls ever!. Just Touch and Drag Ball to Shoot!!

Try to introducing balls in holes to make your camel runRun away from Sand Storm and beat your opponents!
